General.Name: Ciwen Media Co Ltd
General.Description: Ciwen Media Co.,Ltd. engages in the film, television dramas, game products, channel promotions, and artist management businesses in China and internationally. It offers TV dramas, online dramas, movies, online movies, etc. The company was formerly known as Zhejiang Hexin Industry Group Co. Ltd and changed its name to Ciwen Media Co.,Ltd. in January 2016. Ciwen Media Co.,Ltd. was incorporated in 1998 and is based in Beijing, China.

0.Name: Mr. Ming  Yan
0.Title: Sec. of the Board of Directors & Deputy GM
